message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this fantastic product. I think you'll really love it!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me at that price?
I can do better than that, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $110?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that price. How about we try $95? I'm willing to pay that much for the product.
I understand you're close to your limit, Bob, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to compromise a bit further. How about we try $105?
I'm still a bit above $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway again. How about we try $100? That's the lowest I'm willing to go.
